name: Mass Effect 3 - Tuchanka
description:
This short visual novel was based off the game Mass Effect 3 Misson Priority: Tuchanka.

Eve is indeed the key to curing the genophage, but creating a cure will take time. Continue to assist turian and krogan allies while the cure is synthesized.

This is not 100% replica of the scenes that transpire in that mission this was done as a college assignment to showcase my skills with the Unity plugin Fungus.

I do not own any of the Characters/Art/Music.

// Second Term Deliverable MSc Creative Digital Media
